General.Name: Wp Energy Public Company Limited
General.Description: WP Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) under the World Gas brand name. The company operates through Sale of LPG and Transportation segments. It distributes LPG cylinder to the LPG gas filling plants, retail gas distributors, and industrial and household users, as well as offers specialized LPG cylinders for forklift trucks. The company also transports oil, gas, and chemical substances; operates gas station; produces and distributes electricity; and leases vehicles. WP Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
